name: GeLisp

screenshots.caption: Solving a CSP proposed by Compositor Michael Jarrell
Representing the CSP proposed by Michael Jarrell graphically
Solving the musical CSP - All interval series

short_description: A portable and efficient wrapper for the Generic Constraints Development Environment (GECODE) library to Common Lisp. Provides a high level interface and a low level interface. Additionally, it provides an interface to the music environment OpenMusic.
